Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: One of the most important aspects of building a website is the creation of the required templates. Sites generated by OpenCms are built by using one or more templates that define a uniform layout of the presented content. Following the steps described here, you should be able to get your JSP template up and running in a short time.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Learn how to get from an HTML prototype of your website layout to a template.
